40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Faith has seventy-some odd doors, the lowest of which is removing something harmful from the road, and its highest is the statement 'La Ilaha Illallah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اسْتِكْمَالِ الإِيمَانِ وَزِيَادَتِهِ وَنُقْصَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Completion Of Faith, Its Increasing And Decreasing
